message.body: Hey. I haven't heard from you, but mike and I are going to go down the shore on Wednesday and Thursday (assuming my mom doesn't have work Wednesday). Are you able/can you take off those days?
I know! I'm sorry. I was actually going to text you later. Michael still needs to ask at work. His boss has been on vacation but she's back now. Let me text him. I should be able to.
Yes! And I'm going to make sure that my mom is off that Wednesday. I want to do it on a day she's off so she won't be stranded.
Ok. I asked him. Hopefully he'll get an answer soon. Also, I feel bad. He had to put Jackie down this morning. She was in kidney failure.
So I just asked my mom. She actually has an appointment with the social security department so we'll have to go Thursday-Friday. Is that okay?

Yeah. That's fine for me. Michael still needs to ask. I don't foresee it being a problem. I know he does have a lot going on in work though. He just actually needs to ask and put in for it. I'm trying to stay on top of him. Haha.
Haha. No worries!!! The only stipulation is that on Friday we'd have to be back by 5 so I can pick up my mom at work. Haha.
When do you for sure need an answer by so that reservations can be made?
I have no idea. I'd like to make them as soon as possible. Prices will only be going up, but I don't want to rush you, especially if Michael is in a bind.
Ok. I'm just gonna tell him by the end of this week he needs to know.
Okay! If that doesn't work, then I will figure out another day we can go! Even if it's only for a day. We'll hijack a pool!
Haha. Ok. I'll be in touch :)
